rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast Deepmire Abomination, reappropriate or pay {2}. [i](To reappropriate, exile exactly two cards from your hand and/or graveyard.)[/i]
Menace
flavor_text:
[i]“Something in the marshes wears the dried skins of our dead. Find it. Kill it.”
—Kielie, Risti strike leader[/i]
